snippet: The U.S. Federal Communications Commission is granting an emergency temporary waiver to Jewish community centers and telecommunications carriers that serve them to help track down callers who have made threats, the agency said on Friday....

headline.main: Texas Medical Board Orders Probation for Cancer Doctor
headline.print_headline: Texas Medical Board Orders Probation for Cancer Doctor

lead_paragraph: The U.S. Federal Communications Commission is granting an emergency temporary waiver to Jewish community centers and telecommunications carriers that serve them to help track down callers who have made threats, the agency said on Friday.
